snippet: Fox’s chief executive, Rupert Murdoch, hopes to challenge ESPN for some of the lucrative revenue that the sports media giant has had largely to itself for more than three decades.
abstract: Fox intends to create all-sports network called Fox Sports 1; chief executive Ruper Murdoch hopes to challenge ESPN for some of the lucrative revenue that the sports media giant has monopolized for more than three decades.

byline.original: By RICHARD SANDOMIR and AMY CHOZICK

lead_paragraph: Fox’s chief executive, Rupert Murdoch, hopes to challenge ESPN for some of the lucrative revenue that the sports media giant has had largely to itself for more than three decades.

headline.seo: Fox Planning National Sports Network It Hopes Can Challenge ESPN
headline.main: Seeing Riches in Sports TV, Fox Will Create New Network
headline.print_headline: Seeing Riches In Sports TV, Fox to Create New Network
